information: The company BLUMEN UND GÄRTEN GERBER GMBH, is a Wholesaler, founded in 1993, which operates in the Vegetables, edible roots and tubers industry. It also operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry, Nurseries, Textile plants, and Ceilings industries. It is based in Kirchheim, Germany.
